name: Cubes Battles (Local Multiplayer Game)
description:
Welcome to battle cubes, This game is a local multiplayer for two people, I don't really know why I did this in school instead of waiting to get home and develop an actual good game that will be taking days to make. Also this game doesn't have music because Im Lazy and the only sound are the bullets.

I made a singleplayer mode if you don't have friends like me :))

I discord that if you use the top full screen button it will not let you play. I will try to fix it :((

---------------Controls----------------

P1 - W A D to move and S to shoot

P2 - Arrow keys to move and down key to shoot

If you are playing by yourself than use one of the player's control's
